snippet: The Rangers signed defenseman Dan Boyle and forward Tanner Glass on Tuesday.
abstract: New York Rangers sign veteran defenseman Dan Boyle and forward Tanner Glass; Rangers forwards Brian Boyle and Benoit Pouliot, along with defenseman Anton Stralman, sign with other teams.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers signed defenseman Dan Boyle and forward Tanner Glass on Tuesday.

headline.main: Rangers Begin Makeover Only Weeks From Stanley Cup Finals
headline.print_headline: Makeover of Rangers Begins in Earnest
